mapper.insert:
SELECT SEQ_SYSTEM.nextval AS id FROM dual
INSERT INTO SYS_SYSTEM(ID,SYSTEM_ID,CPU_CORE,CPU_SYSTEM_USE,CPU_USER_USE,CPU_LEISURE,CPU_UTILIZATION,MEMORY_ALL,MEMORY_UTILIZATION,MEMORY_USE,JVM_ALL,JVM_UTILIZATION,JVM_USE,CREATE_DATE )VALUES ( #{id}, #{systemEntry.systemId}, #{systemEntry.cpuCode}, #{systemEntry.cpuSystemUse}, #{systemEntry.cpuUserUse}, #{systemEntry.cpuLeisure}, #{systemEntry.cpuUtilization}, #{systemEntry.allMemory}, #{systemEntry.utilizationMemory}, #{systemEntry.useMemory}, #{systemEntry.memoryMax}, #{systemEntry.memoryUtilization}, #{systemEntry.memoryUse}, #{systemEntry.createDate} )
mapper.select: SELECT ID FROM SYS_SYSTEMDIC WHERE UUID = #{sysFile.uuid}
mapper.insert:
SELECT SEQ_SYSTEMDIC.nextval AS id FROM dual
INSERT INTO SYS_SYSTEMDIC (ID ,SYSTEM_ID, DESCRIPTION, FS_TYPE, FREE_SPACE, USE_SPACE, TOTAL_SPACE, UUID, DIC_NAME) VALUES (#{sysFile.id}, #{sysFile.systemId}, #{sysFile.description}, #{sysFile.fsType}, #{sysFile.free}, #{sysFile.used}, #{sysFile.total}, #{sysFile.uuid}, #{sysFile.dirName})
mapper.update: UPDATE sys_systemdic SET DESCRIPTION = #{sysFile.description}, FS_TYPE = #{sysFile.fsType}, FREE_SPACE = #{sysFile.free}, USE_SPACE = #{sysFile.used}, TOTAL_SPACE = #{sysFile.total}, DIC_NAME = #{sysFile.dirName} WHERE ID = #{sysFile.id}
mapper.select: SELECT ID FROM sys_systemconfig WHERE CPU_CODE = #{cpuCode}
mapper.insert:
SELECT SEQ_SYSTEMCONFIG.nextval AS id FROM dual

mapper.update: UPDATE sys_systemconfig SET SYSTEM_NAME = #{enerty.systemName}, CPU_NAME = #{enerty.cpuName}, IP = #{enerty.ip}, LAST_START_TIME = #{enerty.startTime}, RUN_TIME = #{enerty.runtime}, CPU_CODE = #{enerty.cpuCode}, SYSTEM_TYPE = #{enerty.systemType} WHERE ID = #{enerty.id}
mapper.insert:
SELECT SEQ_SYSTEMNETWORK.nextval AS id FROM dual
INSERT INTO sys_systemnetwork (ID,SYSTEM_ID, TX_PERCENT, RX_PERCENT, CREATE_DATE, DATE_TIME) VALUES (#{id},#{netWork.systemId}, #{netWork.txPercent}, #{netWork.rxPercent}, #{netWork.createDate}, #{netWork.createDate})
mapper.select: SELECT ID as id, SYSTEM_NAME as systemName, CPU_NAME as cpuName, IP as ip, LAST_START_TIME as startTime, RUN_TIME as runtime, CPU_CODE as cpuCode, SYSTEM_TYPE as systemType FROM sys_systemconfig WHERE IP = #{systemConfigEnerty.ip}

SELECT * FROM( SELECT ID, SYSTEM_ID as systemId, CPU_CORE as cpuCode,CPU_SYSTEM_USE as cpuSystemUse, CPU_USER_USE as cpuUserUse, CPU_LEISURE as cpuLeisure, CPU_UTILIZATION as cpuUtilization, MEMORY_ALL as allMemory, MEMORY_UTILIZATION as utilizationMemory, MEMORY_USE as useMemory, JVM_ALL as memoryMax, JVM_UTILIZATION as memoryUtilization, JVM_USE as memoryUse, ROUND(MEMORY_USE / MEMORY_ALL, 2) as memoryP, ROUND(JVM_USE / JVM_ALL, 2) as jvmP FROM sys_system WHERE SYSTEM_ID = #{systemEntry.systemId} ORDER BY ID DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM = 1

SELECT SYSTEM_ID as systemId, DESCRIPTION as description, FS_TYPE as fsType, FREE_SPACE as free, USE_SPACE as used, TOTAL_SPACE as total, UUID as uuid, DIC_NAME as dirName, ROUND(USE_SPACE / TOTAL_SPACE,2) as userP FROM sys_systemdic WHERE SYSTEM_ID = #{dirSystemEntry.systemId} ORDER BY ID DESC

SELECT tab.* FROM( SELECT ROUND( AVG( REPLACE(MEMORY_UTILIZATION, 'GB', '') ), 2 ) as UTILIZATION_MEMORY, ROUND( AVG( REPLACE(MEMORY_USE, 'GB', '') ), 2 ) as USE_MEMORY, TO_CHAR( TO_DATE( CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD hh24:mi:ss' ), 'YYYY-MM-DD hh24' ) as CREATE_DATE FROM SYS_SYSTEM WHERE TO_CHAR( TO_DATE( CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD hh24:mi:ss' ), 'YYYY-MM-DD hh24' ) >= #{beginTime} AND TO_CHAR( TO_DATE( CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD hh24:mi:ss' ), 'YYYY-MM-DD hh24' ) <= #{endTime} AND SYSTEM_ID IN ( SELECT ID as id FROM sys_systemconfig WHERE IP = #{ip} ) GROUP BY TO_CHAR( TO_DATE( CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD hh24:mi:ss' ), 'YYYY-MM-DD hh24' ) ) tab ORDER BY tab.CREATE_DATE ASC

SELECT tab.* FROM( SELECT ROUND( AVG( TX_PERCENT ), 2 ) as TX_PERCENT, ROUND( AVG( RX_PERCENT ), 2 ) as RX_PERCENT, TO_CHAR( TO_DATE( CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD hh24:mi:ss' ), 'YYYY-MM-DD hh24' ) as CREATE_DATE FROM SYS_SYSTEMNETWORK WHERE TO_CHAR( TO_DATE( CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD hh24:mi:ss' ), 'YYYY-MM-DD hh24' ) >= #{beginTime} AND TO_CHAR( TO_DATE( CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD hh24:mi:ss' ), 'YYYY-MM-DD hh24' ) <= #{endTime} AND SYSTEM_ID IN ( SELECT ID as id FROM sys_systemconfig WHERE IP = #{ip} ) GROUP BY TO_CHAR( TO_DATE( CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD hh24:mi:ss' ), 'YYYY-MM-DD hh24' ) ) tab ORDER BY tab.CREATE_DATE ASC
